english_translation: [Good are] friends in [arisen] need [Good are] friends when need [arises]
The relinquishing, the abandonment, the non-attachment

class_example: itipi so bhagav? araha? samm?sambuddho vijj?cara?asampanno sugato lokavid? anuttaro purisadammas?rathi satth? devamanuss?na? buddho bhagav?’ti
english_translation: It is so (thus) “He [is] the Blessed One, the Worthy One, the fully Enlightened One, endowed with wisdom and ethical conduct, Fortunate One, knower of the world, incomparable leader of persons to be tamed, teacher of gods and humans, the Awakened One, the Blessed One.”
on another occasion, the Awakened One…
on another occasion, the Awakened One…
